attributes.action: Due to London riots the prime minister and chancellor need to rethink and change the governments spending review
attributes.additional_details: Since the start of the London riots (which have spread to a certain extent) I feel that the UK spending review is completely wrong and needs a serious rethink.  The government has cut nothing from foreign aid and has cut the military, the police, education and many more matters that are closer to the hearts of the British people than our international relations or being kind to the poor when the problems here and the people are now going to suffer from the rushed and irresponsible cuts to the wrong areas of of government spending.
